TopicTitle: Dawn to Jool - A KSP 1.0.4 Adventure

Articles.Content:
When I first found out that KSP 1.0.5 was coming out, I decided that I needed to have a mission to end off my time in 1.0.4. So, I decided to build a Kerbalized version of Dawn, but instead of sending it to Dres, I decided to send it to Jool. So, Dawn to Jool is a small Ion probe, with only 3 stock parts! Presenting, Dawn to Jool!

The launch of Dawn. Dawn was launched aboard a Kerbalized version of the United Launch Alliance's Delta II Medium+

The closest approach to Jool.

Shortly after the closest approach, Dawn encountered Tylo, which lowered the Delta-V cost of slowing into Jool orbit by almost 2000 m/s.

Stay tuned for Part 2!

PS: How do you upload entire Imgur albums?

Edited November 7, 2015 by MacGamer04

Today is a sad day for all the Kerbal's on Kerbin...and Mun...and Minmus as well... I fired the engine on Dawn just a bit to much, without realizing, and Dawn re-entered the atmosphere of Jool...It made it 10 km in before it exploded...#wemissyoudawn.. Anyways, this was a great ending to 1.0.4. Here's to 1.0.5.
